TopicTitle: Kerbin Kolonization Konglomerate - Space Station/Base building Collab

Articles.Content:
In reply to Captain Sierra, I'd say a good endgame is when we've "colonized" the kerbin system.

Colonize is a broad term, of course. Some guidelines, perhaps:

-At least one station around each body (or more)

-A base (or more) on each body (except Kerbin)

-Infrastructure allowing easy travel. This includes refuelling stations, space-docks, transit vessels, etc

As for the next planet to take over, I'd suggest Jool. It is a treasure trove of possibilities. Getting there, while more challenging than Duna, shouldn't be too hard as it has a large SOI. Plus, aerobraking is easy.

Nice video there, Avera8joe.
XD aww I dropped a brownie point...
If we use Jool, we can all launch EVERYTHING within about 5 in game days and someones job could be to one by one aerobrake all ships when they arrive. That'd be very interesting...
